member.name: F:ExcelDataReader.Core.BinaryFormat.BIFFRECORDTYPE.UNCALCED
member.summary: If present the Calculate Message was in the status bar when Excel saved the file. This occurs if the sheet changed, the Manual calculation option was on, and the Recalculate Before Save option was off.
